Text:
^ because without screens you're wasting lots of time and bandwidth then puking at what you end up watching.

We have cable TV.  We don't just press a random channel number and watch whatever it is, we want to KNOW what it is so we can PICK what to watch.

How is that a hard concept?  It's the whole point of picking what you do watch vs what you don't.
Some of us have bandwidth caps, and would prefer to see what we are going to spend that precious bandwidth on before we commit.

Yeah what if she fuckin ugly, fat,  zits on her ass, or the guy has some herpetic lesion?  
I mean really, if anybody,  anybody is going to the trouble of uplaoding, why cant you provide a link to screen shot that works (no advertising , no pop-ups)  Thats a few second effort on behalf of uploader, that is a service to hundereds perhaps thousands of fellow hard up perverts
